author: SkinnyTaste
name: Filipino Adobo Chicken

ingredients.notes: use gluten-free soy sauce for GF and coconut aminos for Paleo

instructions: Marinate chicken in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, jalapeño and pepper, for at least an hour (overnight is ideal). Put chicken, 1/2 cup water, bay leaves and marinade into a deep nonstick skillet and cook on medium-low heat. Cover and cook until the meat is tender, about 45 minutes. Remove the cover and cook an additional 15 minutes, until the sauce reduces. Discard bay leaves and serve over rice if you wish.
